about_the_game:
In "Lettuce Rush," dive into a delightfully bizarre world where you control a peculiar car made of crisp lettuce, with a juicy tomato perched on top as a passenger. Get ready for a thrilling journey through a track filled with challenging obstacles, in a charming and colorful pixel art environment.

The objective is simple: keep moving and dodge all obstacles that come your way. As you progress, the speed increases, testing your reflexes and maneuvering skills. The scenery includes a variety of obstacles, such as cheese mounds, stacks of sliced bread, and even giant carrots rolling towards you!

In addition to dodging obstacles, you can collect special items scattered throughout the track to earn extra points or activate temporary powers that make your journey even more exciting. With each level completed, you advance to more challenging tracks, with new obstacles and unexpected surprises.

Get ready for a unique and fun adventure, where simplicity meets creativity in "Lettuce Rush". Enjoy hours of entertainment as you race down the track in your lettuce car, with the tomato on top, aiming for the highest score and supremacy on the leaderboards. Do you have what it takes to master this crazy and delicious race?
